name: Optimum Link
description:
Enter a dream of procedurally generated content and events - from there, the adventure is up to you. Play alone, with friends, or online with the community. There is no endgame.CONTENT AND FEATURES
  • Roam large open environments
  • Use telekinesis, lasers, and paint to spin the gameplay
  • Spawn items, characters, and structures into the dream
  • Customize your avatar
  • Up to 16 players in customizable online sessions

Everything is Here, in Optimum Link. Everything Here is real.
